name: Amblyopia Treatment Game
description:
To use this game in the treatment of amblyopia (lazy eye) it is necessary to use anaglyph glasses (3D cinema glasses).

The objective is to force the lazy eye to see.  With the use of the glasses, the player will only be able to see a few elements through the lenses, ending up forcing each eye to see its thing.

The goal of the game is to collect all the apples on each level to get to the next one.

Keep in mind that this is a game in development and the target audience is children in early childhood.
